survey_name: Employee Preferences for Workplace Wellness Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on current and potential workplace wellness programs to enhance employee well-being and satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current workplace wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Recommended to use a 5-point Likert scale for better measurement of satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current workplace wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following wellness programs would you be most interested in? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Mental health support (e.g., counseling, stress management)
Physical fitness programs (e.g., gym memberships, yoga classes)
Work-life balance initiatives (e.g., flexible hours, remote work options)
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover a broad range of wellness aspects to gather comprehensive preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following wellness programs would you be most interested in? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Mental health support (e.g., counseling, stress management)
Physical fitness programs (e.g., gym memberships, yoga classes)
Work-life balance initiatives (e.g., flexible hours, remote work options)

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in the current workplace wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to understand participation levels.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in the current workplace wellness programs?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in workplace wellness programs?
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 answer is 'Rarely' or 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Include an open-ended option for 'Other' to capture additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an open-text option (multi-choice + open-ended)

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in workplace wellness programs?
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 answer is 'Rarely' or 'Never'

questions.question_text: Please provide any additional suggestions for improving workplace wellness programs.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage respondents to be specific.

script.question_text: Please provide any additional suggestions for improving workplace wellness programs.
